item.title: CALL FOR PAPERS
item.description:
Who we are looking for?

We are looking for talented and uninhibited developers/QA/etc. It’s time to admit to yourself - you’re waiting for a moment of glory… Come and take!

We are interested in the hardcore technical presentations, hands-on sessions, researches. We offer: 400+ conferees and travel-support (if you are not in N.Novgorod, or even not in Russia).

We have prepared topics which are snazzy in our humble opinion. But if you have your own five-star idea – feel free to offer us a topic not out of the list below.

Topics
  • Android
  • Internet of Things
  • Google Cloud & Google APIs
  • Virtual and Augmented Reality
  • Modern Web Application Development
  • Firebase
  • etc.
Please use this form to submit your proposal.
Deadline: 1th of November 2016.

The program committee picks the most interesting talk proposals and informs the selected submitters until November 15, 2016.

Any Questions?

Emais US

item.title: HANDS UP
item.description:
Here we are!
Soon the hottest December will come in our city.

GDG Nizhny team is working on the sencond superb GDG DevFest in Nizhny Novgorod.

30 000 of people participated GDG Dev Festivals last year. You can read how it was in Nizhny Novgorod here. This year DevFest Nihny Novgorod will take a place in Technopark “Ankudimovka”. The heard of innovations in Nizhny Novgorod. We are goind to see in about 400 attendies that love Google technologies like we.

Here is the most actual themes of this year:
  • Android
  • Internet of Things
  • Google Cloud & Google APIs
  • Virtual and Augmented Reality
  • Modern Web Application Development
  • Firebase
  • etc.

The detailed program will be published soon in Facebook, VK, and Twitter.

Want to contact with us?

Click HERE.

Official hashtags:

#DevFestNN #DevFest16 #gdgnizhny

Follow us in VK, Twitter, Google+ or subscribe to email updates.
